mapper.insert: insert into ps_users (user_name, user_phone_number, user_little_name, user_real_name, user_qq, user_email, user_pwd, user_register_time, user_state, user_company, user_head_image, user_download_number, user_upload_number) values (#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPhoneNumber,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userLittleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userRealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userQq,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userRegisterTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userHeadImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userDownloadNumber,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userUploadNumber,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, user_phone_number, user_little_name, user_real_name, user_qq, user_email, user_pwd, user_register_time, user_state, user_company, user_head_image, user_download_number, user_upload_number from ps_users
mapper.update:
update ps_users
user_register_time = #{userRegisterTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_phone_number = #{userPhoneNumber,jdbcType=BIGINT},
user_little_name = #{userLittleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_real_name = #{userRealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_qq = #{userQq,jdbcType=BIGINT},
user_email = #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_pwd = #{userPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_state = #{userState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_company = #{userCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_head_image = #{userHeadImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_download_number = #{userDownloadNumber,jdbcType=BIGINT},
user_upload_number = #{userUploadNumber,jdbcType=BIGINT}
where user_id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select * from ps_users where user_name = #{username} and user_pwd = #{userpwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from ps_users where user_name = #{username,jdbcType= VARCHAR}
